Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents

Class MyShelfieChoiceBox

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.MyShelfieChoiceBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieComponent, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class MyShelfieChoiceBox extends javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String> implements MyShelfieComponent
Customized ChoiceBox component with MyShelfie styling and decorations.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

      Path for MyShelfie choice box CSS file.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • errorClass

      private final javafx.css.PseudoClass errorClass
      Pseudo-class representing the "error" state of the MyShelfieChoiceBox. This pseudo-class is used to indicate an erroneous value in the ChoiceBox.

    • baseDecorations

      private final List<MyShelfieDecoration> baseDecorations
      List that contains a series of default decorations applied on a component
      See Also:
      • MyShelfieDecoration

  • Constructor Details

    • MyShelfieChoiceBox

      public MyShelfieChoiceBox()
      Create a new ChoiceBox which has an empty list of items.

    • MyShelfieChoiceBox

      public MyShelfieChoiceBox(String initValue)
      Creates a new ChoiceBox with the specified initial value.
      Parameters:
      initValue - The initial value for the ChoiceBox.

  • Method Details

    • setErrorStyle

      public void setErrorStyle(String valueText)
      Sets the error style for the ChoiceBox, indicating an erroneous value. The specified value will be set as the current value, and the error pseudo-class will be activated.
      Parameters:
      valueText - The erroneous value to be set.

    • removeErrorStyle

      public void removeErrorStyle()
      Removes the error style from the ChoiceBox, resetting it to the default style. The error pseudo-class will be deactivated.

    • getCustomizedNode

      public javafx.scene.Node getCustomizedNode()
      Retrieve the element that has to be customized
      Specified by:
      getCustomizedNode in interface MyShelfieComponent
      Returns:
      the element that needs to be customized

    • getBaseDecorations

      public List<MyShelfieDecoration> getBaseDecorations()
      Retrieves the list of default decorations that are applied on a customized component
      Specified by:
      getBaseDecorations in interface MyShelfieComponent
      Returns:
      the list of default decorations
